decompile_function.name: decompile_function
decompile_function.description: Decompiles a function by name using Ghidra's decompiler. Returns the C-like representation of the function's code.

parameters.name: The name of the function to decompile (e.g., 'FUN_14001000', 'main')

decompile_function_by_address.name: decompile_function_by_address
decompile_function_by_address.description: Decompiles a function at the specified address using Ghidra's decompiler. Returns the C-like representation of the function's code.

parameters.address: The address of the function to decompile (e.g., '14001000')

rename_function.name: rename_function
rename_function.description: Renames a function from its current name to a new name. This helps with code readability and understanding program semantics.

rename_function_by_address.name: rename_function_by_address
rename_function_by_address.description: Renames a function at the specified address to a new name. IMPORTANT: Use numerical addresses only, not function names.

parameters.function_address: The address of the function to rename (numerical only, e.g., '14001000')

list_functions.name: list_functions
list_functions.description: Lists all functions in the currently loaded program. This provides a comprehensive view of all defined functions.

list_imports.name: list_imports
list_imports.description: Lists imported symbols in the program with pagination. Useful for understanding external dependencies.

list_exports.name: list_exports
list_exports.description: Lists exported functions/symbols in the program with pagination. Useful for understanding the program's public interface.

list_segments.name: list_segments
list_segments.description: Lists all memory segments in the program with pagination. This provides information about memory layout and permissions.

search_functions_by_name.name: search_functions_by_name
search_functions_by_name.description: Searches for functions by name substring. Useful for finding specific functions without knowing the exact name.

get_current_function.name: get_current_function
get_current_function.description: Gets the function at the current cursor position or selection in Ghidra. Returns the function address and name.

get_current_address.name: get_current_address
get_current_address.description: Gets the address at the current cursor position in Ghidra.
